Elizabeth Town Ky.
Feb 14th 1865.
To his Excelence Thos E. Bramblett
Governor of Kentucky,

Gov the Loyal citizens of this potion of the country petition throuht me to you, for an organization of State Guards, west of the L & N, R R, for the purpose of keeping down these lawless bands of theveis that is Robing the country Gov I think there Should be at lest a Batt to Surve in the western part of the State, if this meets your approbation you will make an order to recruit a batt. please informe me on this Subject.

Your Respectfully
J. R. Aubrey Capt
Com'dg, Hardin Co State guard

Elizabethtown Ky
Feby. 14" 1865
Aubrey J. R.
Capt. Hardin Co. S. G --
To The Gov --
Desires authority for a Batt, to be raised for service in Western Ky --
See if we have not already given sufficient for that section of state

L B No 10 -- 1865 P. 146
Recd A. G. O. Ky 15 Feby 1865
